description: Details of Condition 7 (Material Samples) pursuant to planning permission ref. 24/AP/1595 dated 14/08/2024 for 'Variations of Condition 1 (approved plans) pursuant to planning permission 21/AP/1063 for 'Construction of a three storey, three bedroom detached dwelling facing Elm Grove with a storey and a half studio building at the rear of the property facing Bellenden Road'. The proposed changes include:- Increase the roof height of the dwellinghouse- Reposition of terrace window at the second floor of the dwellinghouse- Reposition of rooflight at the first floor of the dwellinghouse- Rearrangement of glazing walls at the ground floor of the dwellinghouse- Reduction in the footprint of the studio building to remove an external courtyard at first floor level- Reposition of rooflights, introduction of new windows (facing Bellenden Road) and removal of green roof at the first floor of the studio building- Revisions of boundary wall and landscaping along Bellenden Road and boundary with no. 59 Elm Grove- Change in materials of first floor windows on rear elevation facing Bellenden Road- Reduction in width of front entrance facing Elm Grove'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
